entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 2:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 5.3°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait near noon. Temperature steady near 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
